_comment: Configuration Template - Copy to config.json and fill in your credentials
_method2: Session Token (for Google/OAuth login - see SESSION_TOKEN_GUIDE.md)
_captcha_settings: CAPTCHA auto-solve (TESTING ONLY - requires PIL + pytesseract)
_auto_training_note: Set auto_captcha_training=false to stop model retraining until you manually review captcha_learning/failures/
_npc_settings: Automatically battle NPCs encountered during travel
_gathering_settings: Automatically gather materials and event items
_warnings: Only use auto_solve_captcha on test accounts!
_quest_settings: Settings for the Quest Runner bot (quest_runner.py)
_battle_arena_settings: Settings for the Battle Arena bot (battle_arena_bot.py)

_notes.base_url: The base URL of your SimpleMMO instance
_notes.email: Your account email (leave blank if using session_token)
_notes.password: Your account password (leave blank if using session_token)
_notes.session_token: Browser session cookie value (for OAuth users)
_notes.travel_delay_min: Minimum seconds to wait between travel actions
_notes.travel_delay_max: Maximum seconds to wait between travel actions
_notes.enable_random_delays: Use random delays between min/max (more human-like)
_notes._instructions: If you use Google login, see SESSION_TOKEN_GUIDE.md
